law.catch_line: Effect of failure to provide required notification.
law.text: The failure to provide a right, notice or privilege to a victim or witness under KRS 421.510 to 421.550 or 15.245 shall not be grounds for the defendant to seek to have the conviction or sentence set aside.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 212, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1986.
